title: UBC Red Cross Club
description: Treasurer and marketing director for the UBC Red Cross.
fullDescription: In my first year at the UBC Red Cross Club, I acted as treasurer, providing budgets and managing the spending of the club. During my second year, I took on the role of marketing director, where I co-lead a small team of students to make promotional materials such as social media posts for the club. Additionally, I build a website for UBCRCC, which you can find below.
